subtitleNullable: 2+ Million records Amazon Beauty Products Dataset along with URL.
descriptionNullable:
Amazon relies heavily on a **Recommendation Engine** that reviews customer ratings and purchase history to recommend items and improve sales.
This is a dataset related to over **2 Million+** customer reviews and ratings of Beauty related products sold on their website.
•	The unique **UserId** (Customer Identification)
•	The **ProductId** ASIN (Amazon's unique product identification code for each product)
•	**ProductType** (22 Unique Category of Products)
•	**Ratings** (ranging from 1-5 based on customer satisfaction) 
•	The **Timestamp** of the rating (in UNIX time)
•	**URL** link to the product directly on Amazon
